thread.title: Torrington man legend in West Virginia
thread.title_full: Torrington man legend in West Virginia

author: MARK JAFFEE REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN
title: Torrington man legend in West Virginia
text:
Monday, October 19, 2015 7:05 AM EDT 
Torrington man legend in West Virginia BY MARK JAFFEE REPUBLICAN-AMERICAN Torrington native Kevin Gilson was inducted into the West Virginia University Hall of Fame last month, Gilson guided the men's and women's swimming teams for three decades and compiled 290 wins. Browse for Republican American Reprints Retirement has been quite good to Torrington native Kevin Gilson.A decade since retiring as head swimming coach at West Virginia University after a 30-year stint, Gilson enjoys his life with his wife of 48 years, Elizabeth, still around Morgantown, the site of the WVA campus.
